message.content:
I need to identify the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life from this financial statement.

The systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is commonly known as "depreciation." Looking at the financial statements provided:

1. In the balance sheet, I can see "Accumulated Depreciation" with an end amount of 120,631.67 as of 2024-02-05.

2. In the cash flow statement, there's a line item "Depreciation" with an amount of 120,631.67.

3. In the income statement, there's also a line item "Depreciation" with the same amount of 120,631.67.

The depreciation value is consistently reported as 120,631.67 across all relevant financial statements.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '120631.67'} }
```
